apollo.gui.detailviewers.sequencealigner.overview
Class IntervalComponent

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              apollo.gui.detailviewers.sequencealigner.overview.IntervalComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class IntervalComponent
extends javax.swing.JComponent

This is the class which draws intervals. Assumes intervals can be uniquely identified by their start position.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Overrides:
paint in class javax.swing.JComponent

putInterval

public java.lang.Integer putInterval(Interval i,
                                     int height)
Associates the specified height with the specified Interval in this component. If this component previously contained a mapping for the given Interval, the old height is replaced.

Parameters:
i - the interval to be added
height - the height of the given interval
Returns:
previous height associated with specified Interval, or null if there was no mapping for this Interval.

remove

public java.lang.Integer remove(Interval i)
Removes the mapping for this Interval from this component if present.

Parameters:
i - the interval to be removed.
Returns:
previous count associated with specified Interval, or null if there was no mapping for this Interval.
